sentences.en: A soldier was arrested after running amok with a vehicle through Berlin.
sentences.cn: 一名士兵在疯狂飙车穿越柏林后被逮捕。

sentences.en: Berlin people drank champagne, set off fireworks and tooted their car horns.
sentences.cn: 柏林市民喝香槟、放焰火、鸣车笛。

sentences.en: Berlin was divided into four sectors after the war.
But I remember an anecdote I once heard from one of my German friends. Shortly after the unification, an Ossie and a Weissie meet in Berlin.
sentences.cn: 但我记得从一个德国朋友那里听来的这样一件轶事：统一后不久，一个东德人与一个西德人在柏林相遇。

sentences.en: Eating in East Berlin used to be a hazardous and joyless experience.
sentences.cn: 在东柏林就餐曾经是一件危险而且沉闷无趣的事情。

sentences.en: Frank is currently domiciled in Berlin.
He captained the siege of Berlin.
sentences.cn: 他指挥了围攻柏林的战役。

sentences.en: He went to Berlin by aeroplane.
London's musical life might become as exciting as Berlin's.
sentences.cn: 伦敦的音乐生活可能会变得像柏林的一样令人兴奋。

sentences.en: Once you have a flat in central Berlin, you can always monetize it when the prices rise.
sentences.cn: 如果在柏林市中心有一套公寓，价格上涨时就可以随时把它变现。

sentences.en: Once you have a flat in central Berlin,you can always monetize it when the prices rise.
sentences.cn: 如果在柏林市中心有一套公寓，价格上涨时就可以随时把它变现。

sentences.en: Political pressure finally winkled him out and on to a plane bound for Berlin.
sentences.cn: 政治压力最终迫使他离开，登上了去往柏林的飞机。

sentences.en: She left by plane for Berlin.
The Polish market in Berlin was considered unsightly and shut down.
sentences.cn: 柏林市内的波兰市场因为被认为有碍观瞻而关闭了。

sentences.en: The Upper House of the German parliament is to meet today in Berlin.
sentences.cn: 德国的上议院今天将在柏林开会。

sentences.en: They haven't decided whether they will go to London or Berlin.
sentences.cn: 他们尚未决定是去伦敦还是去柏林.

sentences.en: We in Berlin hardly knew a war was on during the early part of 1941.
sentences.cn: 我们身处柏林的人在1941年初几乎感受不到正在打仗。

sentences.en: Within Germany, the city of Berlin lay in ruins.
sentences.cn: 在德国，柏林市已经满目疮痍。

trans.tran_cn: 柏林（前民主德国首都），（亦作B-）柏林细软毛线，（b-）四轮双座篷盖马车，附有马车夫站台
trans.tran_en: a fine wool yarn used for tapestry work, etc
